name: Grapple With Fate
description:
A samurai wrenched from his time, taking on an unimaginable enemy. Swing through the streets as you take on the evil Akuma Co.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Jump - Spacebar

Sword Slash - Left Click

Grappling Hook - Right Click

Sprint - Left Shift

Dash - E

Wall Jump - Continuously press Spacebar will moving and looking at a wall.
